sn35.93:1.1: “Mendicants, consciousness exists dependent on a duality.
sn35.93:1.3: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights.
sn35.93:1.4: The eye is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:1.5: Sights are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:1.6: So this duality is tottering and toppling; it’s impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:1.7: Eye consciousness is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:1.8: And the causes and conditions that give rise to eye consciousness are also impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:1.9: But since eye consciousness has arisen dependent on conditions that are impermanent, how could it be permanent?
sn35.93:1.10: The meeting, coming together, and joining together of these three things is called eye contact.
sn35.93:1.11: Eye contact is also impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:1.12: And the causes and conditions that give rise to eye contact are also impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:1.13: But since eye contact has arisen dependent on conditions that are impermanent, how could it be permanent?
sn35.93:1.14: Contacted, one feels, intends, and perceives.
sn35.93:1.15: So these things too are tottering and toppling; they’re impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:2.1: Ear consciousness … Nose consciousness … Tongue consciousness … Body consciousness …
sn35.93:3.1: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts.
sn35.93:3.2: The mind is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:3.3: Thoughts are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:3.4: So this duality is tottering and toppling; it’s impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:3.5: Mind consciousness is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:3.6: And the causes and conditions that give rise to mind consciousness are also impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:3.7: But since mind consciousness has arisen dependent on conditions that are impermanent, how could it be permanent?
sn35.93:3.8: The meeting, coming together, and joining together of these three things is called mind contact.
sn35.93:3.9: Mind contact is also impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:3.10: And the causes and conditions that give rise to mind contact are also impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:3.11: But since mind contact has arisen dependent on conditions that are impermanent, how could it be permanent?
sn35.93:3.12: Contacted, one feels, intends, and perceives.
sn35.93:3.13: So these things too are tottering and toppling; they’re impermanent, perishing, and changing.
sn35.93:3.14: This is how consciousness exists dependent on a duality.”
